item.title: Creating the image (disk.raw)
item.description: Creating the image (disk.raw) The fastest way of doing this (less than 1 hour “7min”) is to use AWS and chose the c4.8xlarge instance, at the moment of writhing this, is an instance with 36 vCPU / 60 RAM, the important thing to check for is the amount of cores not really the memory. After finishing building, stop or terminate the build instance, mainly because is a very expensive and in best scenario you just want to do all this in less than 1 hour.
